*Spectrum*
- Title: Zn K edge XAS HERFD of ZnO Zn oxide wurtzite at 10K
- Version: #1 (2019-09-02 09:17:01 UTC)
- Measurement type: laboratory measurement (spectrum)
- Spectrum type: fluorescence emission (AU)
- Spectral unit: Energy (eV)
- Valid spectral range(s): 9512.000215-10402.000235 eV (Resol. 0.495 eV)
- Observation geometry: directional
- Spatial observation mode: averaged
- Data analysis: raw averaged spectra
- Quality flag: 
- File name: XAS_HERFD_ZnO_10K.data.txt
- Comments: 

*Sample*
- Name: Pellet of ZnO Zn oxide wurtzite mixed with BN
- Origin(s): commercial
- Type: pellet
- Temperature: 10.0 +/- 5.0 K
- Pressure: 

*Experiment*
- Title: Zn K edge XAS HERFD of Zn compounds at 10K for coordination determination in complex biological systems
- Version: #1 (2019-09-02 09:17:01 UTC)
- Experimentalist(s): Thomas Sara; Mishra Bhoopesh
- Database(s): FAME @ SSHADE
- DOI: https://doi.org/10.26302/SSHADE/EXPERIMENT_ST_20180418_001

*Data reference*
- Thomas, Sara; Mishra, Bhoopesh (2018): Zn K edge XAS HERFD of Zn compounds at 10K for coordination determination in complex biological systems. SSHADE/FAME (OSUG Data Center). Dataset/Spectral Data. https://doi.org/10.26302/SSHADE/EXPERIMENT_ST_20180418_001
